elements.label: A Thrilling Air

slots.label: With
slots.description: Study the correspondences of two matching Edge influences to intensify them. Study how it's affected by Winter influence to subvert it, instead.

slots.label: Knowledge
slots.description: I must understand the influences at work, if I am to strengthen or to subvert them. [You'll need a significant grounding in the relevant lore.]

elements.description: The senses are sharpened. [A second-order influence: apparent to the perceptive, instantly recognisable to an adept. This can be used in some Rites to summon minions.]

elements.description: All flesh fails. But I've been promised that my flesh will fail a little later. [This is a final insurance against sickness, if no Health remains to you.]

elements.description: There is a light behind the world, a light above the Mansus, a light that penetrates both glass and skin. It is present here. [A second-order influence: apparent to the perceptive, instantly recognisable to an adept. This can be used in some Rites to summon minions, and some minions will leave it lingering when they are destroyed.  If unused, it will become Fascination.]
